item.title: feet keyboard emulator
item.description: This is in old idea. I first thought of it when I tried to use VI. My finger was hurting from pressing Ctrl so often. And I thought: - If we use our feet to make driving more efficient, why not the pc? Well, here is your chance Requirements 1 Raspberry PI pico (4 usd) 1 USB cable 2 resistors (to be honest I still don’t understand why this) 2 cheap pedals.
